name: Wella Kolestint Colour
short_description:
Semi-permanent hair color remains stable for only a few days and can be washed in six to 12 washes depending on the formula. In our celebrity Dimple Kapadia, if you are planning to go for a semi-permanent hair color, you should get your hair colored at least a few weeks before the event. These colors also penetrate into the hair shaft. However, unlike permanent hair color, semi-permanent color does not penetrate to the same depth.
Permanent hair color is the best solution to cover your gray hair completely. If you plan to apply permanent hair color to get a refreshing look at any special occasion, then you need to color your hair a few weeks before the event so that the color can be completed with ease.
